name: Jewel Link
description:
--------------Limit free 3 days -----------------

The new line(LianLiankan) game from the makers of hit app, Jewel Link!
The super hit game Jewel Link is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!
-------------------------------------------
● TASTY GRAPHICS that will leave you hungry for more
● EASY AND FUN to play, but a challenge to fully master
● LEADER BOARDS AND AWARDS for you and your friends
● MATCH JEWELS in 50+ puzzles - each one is unique and full of fun and amazing challenges!
● TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated jewels, effects!
● FREE updates with new puzzles, boosts, and more!
--------------------------------------------
Please note: Your device must have an active internet connection to download additional levels.

Please note: Jewel Link is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items with real money.

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Jewel Link!
